Κυτταρο Live.description: Historic live music venue with fifty years tradition on the rock and avant-garde musical scene

ARCH.description: Concert hall with excellent acoustics hosting international and local artists across multiple genres

Half Note Jazz Club.description: All-time classic Athens jazz venue with successful history since 1979, located near First Cemetery

Fuzz Club.description: Large venue with excellent sound and lighting, hosting major international and local artists

Gazarte.description: Cultural complex with cinema, library, concert room, exhibition space, and rooftop bar in the heart of Gazi

Gazarte Main Stage!.description: Main concert stage at Gazarte cultural complex

Gazarte - Ground Stage.description: Ground floor stage at Gazarte cultural complex

Gazarte - Roof Stage.description: Rooftop bar and concert stage with views over Gazi

Shamone.description: Athens' premier LGBTQ+ nightlife venue in Gazi, known for drag shows, comedy nights, and inclusive entertainment

K4.description: Independent cultural space in Koukaki hosting experimental theater, dance, and performance art

Theatro Avaton.description: Intimate theater space in Gazi specializing in contemporary drama and experimental performances

Theatro OLVIO.description: Modern theater venue in Gazi presenting contemporary Greek productions and international works

Megaron Concert Hall.description: Athens' premier classical music venue, hosting the Athens State Orchestra and international symphony orchestras

Theatre of the NO.description: Alternative theater space in Metaxourgeio known for innovative productions and emerging artists

Six D.O.G.S.description: Multi-purpose cultural space hosting live music, performances, exhibitions, and parties with a popular garden courtyard

Gagarin 205.description: Major live music venue hosting international and local rock, metal, and alternative concerts with standing room for 1,200 or seated for 600

AN Club.description: Historic rock venue operating for over three decades, one of Athens' oldest rock clubs in the alternative Exarchia neighborhood

Piraeus Club Academy.description: Athens' biggest and most active live music venue in the city center, hosting diverse international and local productions

Christmas Theater.address: Leof. Veikou 137, Galatsi Olympic Hall, Athens 111 46
Christmas Theater.description: Large seasonal theater venue at Galatsi Olympic Facilities presenting family-friendly festive shows and theatrical productions

Theatro Fournos.description: Intimate experimental theater since 1992, housed in a converted 1930s family bakery presenting contemporary and avant-garde productions

Theatro Stoa.description: Established theater company since 1971 presenting new Greek and international contemporary drama and premieres

Vergina Theatro.description: Contemporary theater venue in northern Athens presenting modern Greek theater productions

Bios.description: Multi-venue cultural center in a Bauhaus building with music halls, theater, rooftop bar, and Acropolis views. Founded in 2001

Temple Athens.description: Major live venue with top-notch sound system hosting rock, metal, punk, techno, and electronic music. Capacity 1,200 standing or 600 seated

Stavros Niarchos Foundation Cultural Cen.description: Major cultural complex with Greek National Opera, National Library, and 210,000 m² park. Renzo Piano design, completed 2016

Technopolis.description: Industrial museum and cultural venue in former 1857 gasworks (30,000 m²). Over 1 million annual visitors for concerts, exhibitions, festivals

Stavros tou Notou.description: Historic music venue since 1995, one of Athens' most popular concert halls featuring rock, pop, and art music performances

Ιδρυμα Βασιλη και Ελιζας Γουλανδρη.description: Modern art museum in neoclassical building with contemporary extension, opened October 2019 near Panathenaic Stadium

Αμφιθεατρο Ιωαννης Δεσποτοπουλος Ωδειο Α.address: Rigillis Street & Vasileos Konstantinou Avenue, Athens 106 75
Αμφιθεατρο Ιωαννης Δεσποτοπουλος Ωδειο Α.description: Modern subterranean amphitheater completed 2022 at Athens Conservatoire, inspired by ancient Greek theaters with modern technical facilities

Γυαλινο Μουσικο Θεατρο.description: Musical theater venue established 1997 on Syngrou Avenue presenting contemporary Greek and international musical productions

MEGARON - The Athens Concert Hall.description: Athens' premier classical music venue, hosting the Athens State Orchestra and international symphony orchestras

Θεατρο Παλλας.description: Historic 1932 cinema-theatre renovated in 2006, once the finest in the Balkans. Hosts theatrical, musical performances, and concerts

Δημοτικη Αγορα Κυψελης.description: Historic 1935 market renovated as cultural hub in 2018, hosting social enterprises, exhibitions, workshops, festivals, and performances

Ελληνικο Παιδικο Μουσειο.description: Children's museum in 600 m² space at Athens Conservatoire, serving 50,000 children annually with interactive exhibits for ages up to 12

Οικογενειακα Προγραμματα - Μουσειο Μαρια.description: First Maria Callas museum worldwide, opened 2023. Immersive opera exhibition opposite Athens Cathedral with family programs

Floyd.description: New major indoor live venue opened October 2023 by Fuzz Productions, hosting international and Greek artists with 2,300 capacity

Death Disco.description: Athens' New Wave hotspot specializing in darkwave, post-punk, and goth music in the heart of Psyrri nightlife district

Πλατεια Νερου, Φαληρο.description: Major seaside open-air venue hosting Release Athens Festival and Ejekt. Waterfront location overlooking Faliro Marina, revived for 2004 Olympics

Κεντρο Πολιτισμου Ιδρυμα Σταυρος Νιαρχος.description: Creative workshop space at SNFCC complex offering hands-on educational activities, family programs, and maker events in modern cultural center

Cinobo Patission.description: Athens' first repertory cinema, historic 1961 venue reopened 2024 by Cinobo streaming platform. Cult classics, Action Sundays, Studio Ghibli tributes

Alsos Veikou.description: Open-air amphitheater in 63-acre Galatsi Grove hosting summer theater, concerts, and cultural events with 2,000 seats

Alhambra Art Theater.description: Renovated art theater in Exarchia with 425 seats, designed by architect Panos Petridis for contemporary theatrical productions

Romantso.description: Former Romantso magazine printing plant converted to creative hub and cultural center by Bios. Multi-space venue with rooftop (600), club (500), and main stage (400)

Caja De Musica.description: Intimate venue with history hosting diverse musical encounters. 150 seated + 50 standing capacity with excellent acoustics, wheelchair accessibility, and cocktail menu

Κεντρο ελεγχου τηλεορασεων.description: Intimate creative space in former 1970s TV repair shop, hosting performing arts, experimental music, documentary screenings, and seminars since 2012

Faust.description: Multi-purpose bar, theatre, and live music space hosting electronic, indie, and jazz performances in Mets neighborhood

Καφεθεατρο.description: Theater cafe venue near Pedion Areos hosting music performances and cultural events in intimate setting

Σταυρος του Νοτου - Σταυρος του Νοτου Pl.description: Additional stage at Stavros tou Notou complex, one of Athens' most popular concert halls since 1995

Σταυρος του Νοτου - Σταυρος του Νοτου -.description: Club space at Stavros tou Notou complex featuring DJ sets and electronic music events

Technopolis Citroen.description: Main concert hall within Technopolis cultural park, named after the historic Citroen building. Hosts major concerts and cultural events
